abstract: New York Yankees make their formal offer to pitcher C C Sabathia in effort to keep him from opting out of his contract; terms of offer are no known.
snippet: The terms of the offer are not known, but the Yankees hope it will keep him from considering deals with other teams.
lead_paragraph: The terms of the offer are not known, but the Yankees hope it will keep him from considering deals with other teams.

headline.main: Yankees Make Offer to Keep Sabathia From Opting Out
headline.print_headline: Yankees Make Offer to Keep Sabathia From Opting Out
headline.seo: Yankees Make Offer to Keep Sabathia From Opting Out
